title: "Fox Movie" tv spot logo
content:
Hello,  
I was wondering if anyone knows of the best place to hunt down a typeface I just saw on on tv? It was was for commercial for “Fox Movies” on the Fox channel. I tried going to their website, but no luck. It flashes really quick during the commercial so it’s hard to get a good look at it, but it has similar features to “ALLOY” FROM [http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0027](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105827/http:/youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0027 "http://youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0027")

Thank you!

 [‹ (x) Sabine bold italic w/ small serifs - Fairplex Wide {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35908 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "The Philosophy of Andy Warhol" book cover - ITC Serif Gothic {Brandon Schoe} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924105827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35913 "Go to next forum topic")
author: louvega

comments.content: Mike Cina and Mike Young from WeWorkForThem/YWFT do work for Fox... it might be a custom job, then.
